Confused, Hafizah asks the man who was pickpocketed to use his son, Gio (Rendy Kjaernett), as her pretend boyfriend.

programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 30
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: KUTUKLAH AKU DENGAN CINTAMU
programme.desc: A village girl who, for some reason, seems to be "cursed" with an aura that always makes her LOSE in everything, from competitions to neighborhood council elections, so no one wants to get close to her. She is told to approach Elang, a thug who always wins in fights, in order to lose. Unexpectedly, Elang ends up falling in love with Matahari.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 50
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Circle Abang Cilok Mood Banget
programme.desc: Bang Toyib (Masaji Wijayanto) is constantly harassed by Sumi (Shanice Margaretha). Sumi lies to her father, claiming she is pregnant and that Bang Toyib got her pregnant. However, Bang Toyib continues to deny that he never got Sumi pregnant.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 504
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 30
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: KUPINANG KAMU DENGAN DISUNAT
programme.desc: Hafizah (Larasati Nugroho) saves a man who has been pickpocketed. Because she helped him sincerely, Hafizah refuses to accept any money as a token of her gratitude. Hafizah, who doesn't want to be matched with Rafael, is told to bring a handsome and wealthy boyfriend like Rafael. Confused, Hafizah asks the man who was pickpocketed to use his son, Gio (Rendy Kjaernett), as her pretend boyfriend.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 50
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Jodoh Direview Cinta Yang Viral
programme.desc: Aqila is a very famous vlogger. However, Aqila dresses in Sailormoon cosplay and calls herself Sailorfood. Sailorfood reviews food and tells the truth about its deliciousness, whether it's delicious or not, through live broadcasts.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 504
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Ketoprak Spesial Cintanya Gak Ngakal
programme.desc: In his dream, a ketoprak seller is driving around and is nearly hit by a car driven by Devan (Kenny Austin), who looks just like him. The ketoprak seller is confused by his sudden wealth. Meanwhile, a female ketoprak seller is also confused by her sudden wealth.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 31
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: KUTUNGGU JOMBLONYA SI RATU AYAM
programme.desc: Fira (Yasmin Napper) is extremely stressed because her family is bankrupt and she has to work on her grandfather's chicken farm. At the chicken farm, Fira meets Erwin (Ridho Ilahi), who is assigned to find chickens for his restaurant. Erwin actually has a phobia of chickens, but to gain Grandma's trust, Erwin is forced to do it. Fira and Erwin also often fight.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 51
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Begitu Syulit Merazia Cintamu
programme.desc: Lionil (Andrew Andika) works as a Public Order Agency (Satpol PP) officer. However, strangely, Nadia (Yunita Siregar), Lionil's younger sister, sells goods on the roadside and is constantly caught in raids. Lionil asks Nadia to stop, but she insists on being independent and succeeding in business at her young age.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 505
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 31
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.title: KUTUNGGU JOMBLONYA SI RATU AYAM
programme.desc: Fira (Yasmin Napper) is extremely stressed because her family is bankrupt and she has to work on her grandfather's chicken farm. Erwin actually has a phobia of chickens, but to gain Grandma's trust, Erwin is forced to do it. Fira and Erwin also often fight.

programme.title: Lawak Ke Dik? - EP 1
programme.desc: Program untuk kanak-kanak bagi menyuarakan pendapat dan berkongsi buah fikiran mereka secara spontan.

programme.title: Sembang Teh Tarik S2 - EP 14
programme.desc: Sembang Teh Tarik yang dikendalikan Datuk AC Mizal ia merupakan program 'talk show' yang santai sesuai untuk tontonan semua.

programme.title: Karoot Komedia - EP 3
programme.desc: Karoot Komedia adalah sebuah rancangan komedi muzikal 30 minit yang menggabungkan muzik, lakonan sketsa dengan topik-topik menarik yang akan dilakonkan secara spontan.

programme.title: Dahlia - EP 26
programme.desc: Dahlia memiliki segalanya, namun semuanya musnah akibat sikap khianat kawan baiknya sendiri yang ingin merampas semua miliknya termasuk suami, anak & harta.

programme.title: Jangan Pandang Belakang Congkak The Series - EP 21
programme.desc: Jangan Pandang Belakang Congkak The Series kisah tiga sekawan yang menemui congkak yang usang , Setelah itu, pelbagai kejadian aneh melanda kampung tersebut.

programme.title: Cik Reen Encik Ngok Ngek - EP 6
programme.desc: Azreen dan Harris terpaksa berkahwin apabila adik mereka melarikan diri pada malam sebelum bernikah. Adakah perkahwinan Harris dan Azreen akan berkekalan selepas Roadtrip Misadventures mereka?

programme.title: NoYa - EP 6
programme.desc: Noya bertujuan untuk mengambil semua kegilaan dan ketawa Aya dan Noreen telah diukir dan membawanya ke peringkat seterusnya.

programme.title: Destinasi Ke Destinasi - EP 11
programme.desc: Sebuah program menarik untuk tontonan semua.

programme.title: Makhluk Manis Dalam Bis - EP 11
programme.desc: Pertemuan pertama Emil dengan Gaby di dalam bas, seorang gadis manis misteri yang dia panggil Sweet Creatures. Sejak itu Emil berusaha mencari keberadaan Gaby, yang tinggal bersama datuknya.

programme.title: Skrin Komedia: Tuyul Ke London - EP 3
programme.desc: Drama komedi seram tentang sepasang pencuri bertindak menggunakan seekor tuyul untuk mengembangkan jenayah mereka tapi perancangan mereka membawa mereka bertembung dengan pelbagai hantu yang tak disangka.

programme.title: Biniku Ninja - EP 15
programme.desc: Azlan berasal dari keluarga susah yang akhirnya berjaya merantau ke UK setelah mendapat tawaran menyambung ijazah dalam aliran seni. Kisah bermula apabila beliau berjumpa dengan seorang gadis

programme.title: Sembang Teh Tarik S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Sembang Teh Tarik yang dikendalikan Datuk AC Mizal ia merupakan program 'talk show' yang terbaru dan santai sesuai untuk tontonan semua.

programme.title: Cinta Nikita - EP 2
programme.desc: Laila terkenal di kampungnya berkat vlog yang dimuatnya, sehingga orang di kampung memanggilnya dengan nama Nikita (noNI iKI artis koTA).

programme.title: Chapalrela - EP 7
programme.desc: Anjang Merah kematian ibu dan terpaksa tinggal dengan ibu tirinya, Mak Jenab dan saudara tirinya Jali Puteh. Anjang Merah sentiasa didera juga ditugaskan menjaga kandang kambing ayahnya, Pak Manap.

programme.title: Kail Pagi Makan Petang - EP 3
programme.desc: Program mengisahkan tentang teknik memancing dan ikuti pengembaran mereka untuk mengetahui ikan yang ditangkap dan masakan menarik yang akan disediakan.

programme.title: Seminggu Sekali - EP 17
programme.desc: Bersama Douglas Lim & Adibah Noor, saksikan mereka mengupas dan menyampaikan isu semasa kepada masyarakat secara santai dan lucu.

programme.title: Karoot Komedia - EP 4
programme.desc: Karoot Komedia adalah sebuah rancangan komedi muzikal 30 minit yang menggabungkan muzik, lakonan sketsa dengan topik-topik menarik yang akan dilakonkan secara spontan.

programme.title: Gengster Leng Chai
programme.desc: Black dikira gagal sebagai seorang gengster, di mana dia mudah lembut hati dengan orang. Selepas bertemu dengan Mawar, dia berhasrat untuk berubah walaupun mendapat tentangan ramai pihak.

programme.title: Aiman Tempe Mania The Series - EP 1
programme.desc: Aiman yang berumur 6 tahun petah bercakap dan berfikiran lebih matang sentiasa membantu orang disekelilingi untuk menyelesaikan masalah mereka.

programme.title: Destinasi Ke Destinasi - EP 12

programme.title: Jaguh Kampung 3 - EP 9
programme.desc: Saksikan para peserta yang mewakili kampung masing masing bertanding dalam acara memasak dengan menu ala kampung.

programme.desc: Saksikan gelagat Nana Mahazan bersama selebriti popular melatah sambil bermain permainan menarik dan kumpulan manakah yang digelar juara bagi setiap episod.

programme.title: Sukan Pejabat - EP 11
programme.desc: Sebuah sitcom game show yang paling tidak adil di dunia dan memang tidak akan adil seperti realiti kehidupan di pejabat andamungkin?

programme.title: Frust Gila - EP 2
programme.desc: Frust Gila rancangan permainan penuh cabaran untuk 3 peserta, cabaran di sediakan untuk mendapatkan hanya satu pemenang.

programme.title: Tapao - EP 1
programme.desc: Kembara mencari makan menyajikan keindahan visual. Tapi bagaimana jika hidangan itu dibungkus? Adakah sama enak di meja restoran? Kena dengan namanya, Tapao mencari jawapan di sebalik persoalan ini.

programme.title: Tak Kot - EP 13
programme.desc: Saksikan selebriti popular tanah air bercuti sambil dicabar menangani fobia yang terdapat dalam diri mereka. Berjayakah mereka menyelesaikan misi?

programme.title: Sepahtu Reunion Live 2024 - EP 7
programme.desc: Nantikan sketsa yang lebih lucu dengan kemunculan tetamu istimewa,dan cameo yang bakal menghiburkan anda semua.

programme.title: My Sweet RT - EP 1
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang wanita bernama Mona. Dia adalah wanita yang suka motosikal, dan juga suka bertengkar, jadi dia digelar wanita yang kuat.

programme.title: Isteri Halal - EP 61
programme.desc: Dengan kehadiran 'Bedah', Eyra dapat meneruskan langkahnya untuk mejatuhkan Adellia. Nabil terpaksa meminta pertolongan Adellia untuk menyelamatkan perniagaan Zayn. Maria masih penuh dengan muslihat.

programme.title: Naluri Hati - EP 18
programme.desc: Pada hari perkahwinannya, Dinda teragak-agak kerana dia akan berkahwin dengan orang yang tidak dicintainya. Namun, satu kejadian berlaku dan menyebabkan Dinda mengalami amnesia separa.

programme.title: RASA Projek Gerenti Jadi - EP 2
programme.desc: Majalah masakan di Malaysia kini di kaca televisyen anda memaparkan resepi - resepi menarik setiap minggu yang dihoskan oleh Norzaini Abdul Halim (Aunty Aini) bersama - sama Adam Mahamed Ismail.

programme.title: The House: Ezurin Khyra - EP 1
programme.desc: The House menampilkan Ezurin Khyra yang sering menjadi sorotan kerana imej glamornya. Program ini juga menayangkan keperibadian ibu kepada lima orang cahaya mata ini yang tidak diketahui umum.

programme.title: Pengantin Lelaki Untuk Cik Gadis - EP 20
programme.desc: Kecewa dengan impian untuk bergelar tentera, Kris al-Hadi ke ladang Tok Abah. Pertemuan dengan Salsabila, gadis malang yang difitnah hingga terpenjara telah menimbulkan rasa simpati dan cinta.

programme.title: Sesat - EP 11
programme.desc: Sesat, rancangan yang menguji minda dan ikhtiar hidup selebriti tempatan dalam mencari destinasi yang ditetapkan.

programme.title: 3 Campur 2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Kisah sebuah keluarga yang mempunyai lima adik beradik tiri. Ayahnya mempunyai tiga orang anak dan isteri baru mempunyai dua orang anak yang nakal. Timbul pelbagai konflik dan komedi dalam cerita ini.

programme.title: Keluarga Iskandar S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Seorang ibu yang tegas dan penyayang bernama Mak Jah yang berusaha sedapa upaya untuk menyatukan anak-anak, menantu dan cucu-cucunya yang dilanda perpecahan.

programme.title: Indonesian Street Food - EP 4
programme.desc: Separa dokumentari yang meneroka tentang masakan makanan jalanan di seluruh Indonesia

programme.title: Diam Tanda Setuju
programme.desc: Kisah dua sahabat baik yang berhadapan dengan konflik perhubungan di saat mereka mula panik memikirkan usia mereka yang semakin meningkat tetapi belum bertemu jodoh.

programme.title: Strawberi Karipap The Series - EP 2

programme.title: Les Cadors
programme.desc: Antoine, a married man with two children who is a boat driver, and Christian, a single unemployed man who is always getting into fights: two completely opposite brothers. But when Antoine, the perfect husband, gets involved in some dirty business, Christian arrives in Cherbourg to come to his aid and reconnect with him.

programme.title: La Grande Arche
programme.desc: When the austere district of La Defense, a symbol of modernity, becomes the setting for a reflection on architecture, memory, and power.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 11
programme.desc: Off to Montreal to discover the Musee des Beaux-Arts. Guided by meditation, Mathias Bensimon creates profound and luminous canvases. Haider Ackermann expresses the sensuality and eroticism so dear to Tom Ford, while adding a touch of poetry and gentleness. Sculptor Salome Cousseau shapes wood with passion and elegance.

programme.title: File D'attente - EP 11
programme.desc: Supported by Jean-Baptiste, eleonore is ready to do whatever it takes to get Sacha back. Jacinthe wants to buy Alice's shares in the business.

programme.title: File D'attente - EP 12
programme.desc: Margot has had an accident and has been put into a drug-induced coma. In her dreams, she relives some of the key moments in her life.

programme.title: File D'attente - EP 13
programme.desc: Louis and Dominique sort through Margot's personal effects. Alice packs her bags ready to go abroad. eleonore and Jean-Baptiste want to find somewhere new to move to, a place to settle down.

programme.title: Carbone - EP 11
programme.desc: Marshlands are not simply rich in biodiversity, they are also essential in adapting to climate change.

programme.desc: A magazine programme devoted to the mountains. An opportunity to explore a rich and fascinating world and take a sumptuous journey through the heart of the most beautiful landscapes of the Auvergne-Rhone-Alpes region.

programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.desc: Visit to a former church transformed into a home. Then, in Degersheim, we plunge into the world of magic and show time in the museum-home of a couple of passionate artists, fairy tale atmosphere guaranteed!

programme.title: Curieux Begin - EP 6

programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Curieux Begin - EP 6
programme.desc: Stopover in Italy! From Chianti to Subbiano, from large vineyards to small farms, Christian visits Tuscany and discovers its land, artisans, and culinary treasures.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison ! - EP 14
programme.desc: Visit to a former church transformed into a home. Then, in Degersheim, we plunge into the world of magic and show time in the museum-home of a couple of passionate artists, fairy tale atmosphere guaranteed!

programme.desc: A magazine programme devoted to the mountains. An opportunity to explore a rich and fascinating world and take a sumptuous journey through the heart of the most beautiful landscapes of the Auvergne-Rhone-Alpes region.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 24
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 27
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 40
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 5
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Roi Keita - EP 1
programme.desc: The entire empire is on alert: Soundiata Keita's mother has been kidnapped. Abdul, as thirsty for power as ever, heads to the city of the sacred baobab trees.

programme.title: Roi Keita - EP 2
programme.desc: The entire empire is on alert: Soundiata Keita's mother has been kidnapped. Abdul, as thirsty for power as ever, heads to the city of the sacred baobab trees.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: La Fabuleuse Histoire Des Sciences Au Quebec - EP 1
programme.desc: In the early 1920s, the visionaries Leo Pariseau, Jacques Rousseau and particularly Brother Marie-Victorin, debated the foundation of the Acfas, based on the model of American and British scientific societies. The aim: to lay the foundations of a strong scientific culture for francophone Canada.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. programme.title: Les Chefs! - EP 2
programme.desc: A duck dish and two sides were featured on the last first-class dinner menu served on the ''Titanic'' in April 1912. The participants must try to recreate it.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Comme Un Avion
programme.desc: Michel is a computer graphics designer and an avid fan of airmail. One day, he discovers a new passion for kayaking. He decides to buy a kit boat and, encouraged by his wife, Rachelle, heads off on a solo trip. He is soon meeting more and more people along the river.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 11

programme.desc: Delpierre and Villeneuve prepare to defend the anti-Lymitrol amendment with a radio interview. Bowman decides to leak the link between the MP's wife and the Paoletti Foundation. Chloe discovers that her father had made one last phone call before dying.

programme.title: Jeux D'influence - EP 6
programme.desc: Chloe is convinced that Percy is involved in her father's death. He then tries to ensure she poses a threat. Saskia's intimidation attempt leads Sorensen to contact Claire. She manages to get him to reveal the name of the laboratory that tested Edenx, thus relaunching her investigation.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes - EP 11
programme.desc: International relations analysed using geography maps, which are vital to understanding the world in which we live and the challenges it presents.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Ment 4
programme.desc: Verner calls on his colleagues from sensitive affairs to help his partner, Isabelle. She changed her identity to escape a violent husband, Manotti, who enjoys protected witness status. But he has found her and wants to regain custody of their son Tom.

programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 6
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 18
programme.desc: Resilience is a word that encapsulates Manchester United centre back Harry Maguire. Since joining Old Trafford for a then world record fee for a defender, Maguire has been at the heart of the highs and lows in a tumultuous period in the club's illustrious history. Despite setbacks including losing the captaincy, being dropped by England and the worst season in the club's history last term, Maguire has never taken a backwards step.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Andre Ward vs. Chad Dawson
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. Ward (25-0, 13 KOs) vs. Chad Dawson (31-1, 17 KOs) in a championship contest from the Oracle Arena in Oakland, California, USA, on September 8, 2012. A paid attendance of 7,611 brought in a gate of $706,469 and 1.

programme.title: World Karate Federation

Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about how the use of motion animation technology can help martial artists learn more efficient ways to put extra power behind their punches and kicks.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best judo of the World Team Championships from Budapest, where we will see history made as it's the first time a new mixed gender team format will be seen.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Winky Wright
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light heavyweight title contest featuring 47-4-1 Bernard Hopkins and the 51-3-1 Winky Wright, who has not lost a bout in over seven years.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Ikioi, Tamawashi, Takakeisho, and Yoshikaze from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Rusty Derouen
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector 'Macho' Camacho (46-3-0, 20 KO) battles Rusty Derouen (33-6-0, 25 KO) in a 10-round Halbmittel contest from Erie, Pennsylvania, USA.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 61
programme.desc: The Teletubbies accidentally leave the Tiddlytubbies' gate open and some of them escape into Home Dome. The Teletubbies must find them all and then close the gate.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S7) - EP 1
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'a', and we go on an adventure around the sound. There's an astronaut, some adorable alpacas and an angry alligator!

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 36
programme.desc: Fly is on the lookout for a very special flower known as a rainbow flower. But when Fly's adventure takes her a little too far from Pop Paper City, her friends have to find her and bring her home.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S2) - EP 3
programme.desc: Snowden has lost his pine cone ears. Will Messy and his chums find them in time for his performance in the OKIDO Ice Skating Extravaganza?

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 6
programme.desc: When Dad complains about how dissimilar Bluey and Bingo are, Bluey hatches a plan to make them more alike and happily introduces Mini-Bluey!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 5
programme.desc: Dad pretends he was born yesterday. Bluey and Bingo have to guide him through his second day on Earth, especially when he discovers food is delicious and steals Lucky's Dad's pie.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 6
programme.desc: Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 5
programme.desc: Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 10
programme.desc: Today at Squirrel Club, there are all sorts of comparisons to learn - from small to smallest, hungry to hungriest, and Duggee to Duggiest!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 22
programme.desc: The Go Jetters must save the famous salt statues in the Wieliczka Salt mine

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 8
programme.desc: Not wanting to go to bed, Bluey tries to dream about being a nocturnal fruit bat so she can stay up all night long and soon finds herself flying through the night sky.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 10
programme.desc: On Bingo and Bluey's Rug Island, a pack of felt pens can be anything: bananas, campfires, even a snake. But Dad will need to embrace his inner kid if he wants to make it his home.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 5
programme.desc: Globetrotting Andy, Jen and Scout are on a new mission in their Eco-Explorer: to discover more about incredible animal families and their babies.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S3) - EP 19
programme.desc: When a group of astronomers get lost on Woofton Hill at night, Dan and Jamie get their kit together for a night-time search.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar meet some agile gibbons who show them how well they can move. Next, they meet a tall, long-legged bird called a seriema.

programme.title: Playtime Towers (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Bella and Lift are visited by a shining star and set off to explore the floors of Playtime Towers. The first stop is Sketch in Boxtropolis - what will she be making today?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 23
programme.desc: The Squirrels are exploring in the attic when they find an old cassette tape.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 22
programme.desc: It's time for the summer fair, and Eugene is the organiser.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 21
programme.desc: The squirrels have to solve the mystery of the missing red ruby.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 42
programme.desc: Glitch's trip to a funky floating farm becomes a rescue mission on a fast-flowing river.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 41
programme.desc: A race between Xuli, Lars and Glitch gets serious when a tornado hits the Academy Island.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 21
programme.desc: Thomas is working on the Italian Railway, keen to prove to his new friend Gina that he is an expert in all things Italian.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 49
programme.desc: Myrtle calls Stanley to help solve the mystery of the Phantom Knitter. Overhearing this, Fifi jumps at the chance to help forming a dynamic, detective duo!

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 48
programme.desc: Myrtle calls Stanley to see if she can practice her first aid skills on him, but he's all fit and healthy. Instead, they go about the town making good use of Myrtle's newfound abilities.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 56
programme.desc: Monty is avoiding taking a bath and wonders if you really need to get wet to get clean.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 38
programme.desc: JoJo finds out that some grown-ups go to work in the night time - like Neil the Postie.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 1
programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 2
programme.desc: Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 3
programme.desc: Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mum's word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why it's important not to break them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 26
programme.desc: Happy sets his sights on a questionable looking puddle that he is determined to splash in!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 25
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels hop inside the Biology Bus and miniaturize themselves.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: It's fun on the counting train until Naughty Monkey starts to drive! Ethel makes a shape, Frog drops beats with a ribbit song, and Enid turns into anime to chase after a mouse.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 22
programme.desc: The Go Jetters must save the famous salt statues in the Wieliczka Salt mine

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S2) - EP 17
programme.desc: It's Broccoli and his floret, Broc, performing their phenomenal ventriloquist act.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S2) - EP 16
programme.desc: Love and peace symbol, Lychee, performs his song - "All You Need is Lychee!"

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 23
programme.desc: Supertato is delighted when Evil Pea becomes his sidekick but it's all a trick and Evil Pea captures him! Evil Pea is forced to do a good deed because one of the Cobs needs help.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 24
programme.desc: Supertato and Evil Pea get stuck inside a giant bubble together. They float through the air until Supertato and Evil Pea pop the bubble by driving it into a supermarket sign.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 62
programme.desc: When it's time for the Tubby Custard Ride, there's a special trailer the Teletubbies haven't seen before. It's for The Noo-Noo who gets to go on a special Tubby Custard Ride.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S7) - EP 2
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'b', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We see some brilliant beards, blow some bubbles and meet a baboon bouncing balls!

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 37
programme.desc: The friends board the Zip Express, a train that takes them across Pop Paper City. But when the friends face an unexpected challenge, it's unknown if the train will reach their destination on time.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S2) - EP 4
programme.desc: OKIDO's biggest robot Stan Tall has no sense of touch and is longing to feel the snow and the wind on his face. Will Messy and his friends be able to help?

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 7
programme.desc: Bluey can't get to sleep, so Mum reads her one last story. But they are interrupted by Unicorse, the most annoying hand puppet in the world, whom Bluey tries to reform.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 6
programme.desc: When Dad complains about how dissimilar Bluey and Bingo are, Bluey hatches a plan to make them more alike and happily introduces Mini-Bluey!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 7
programme.desc: Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 6
programme.desc: Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 10
programme.desc: Today at Squirrel Club, there are all sorts of comparisons to learn - from small to smallest, hungry to hungriest, and Duggee to Duggiest!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 11
programme.desc: How many siblings does Norrie have? What's Duggee's favourite badge? What does everyone do on Fridays? Squirrel Club has the answers!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 23
programme.desc: A Giant Grandmaster Glitch means BIG trouble for the Giant's Causeway!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: When Bluey forgets to put her favourite toy away, Socks grabs it! The kids stage a horsey wedding to distract her, with Dad and Uncle Stripe as the horses!

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 11
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want everyone to play charades, but Muffin and Socks are too young to understand the rules and Nana must think quickly to keep the game on track.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 40
programme.desc: It has snowed and almost no one can get about. Stanley builds a snow plough out of surf boards to clear the streets and makes a huge snow hill so that his friends can sledge down it.

A short distance away, Rick joins a small army of seaweed harvesters who are feeding an increasing appetite for a natural food more common in Japan.

programme.title: Donal Skehan: Home Cook (S1) - EP 8

programme.title: Jamie's Christmas Shortcuts (S1) - EP 1

programme.title: Jamie's Christmas Shortcuts (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Jamie celebrates leftovers and transforms them into delicious dishes for between Christmas and New Year: A vegetable tarte tatin, Brussels sprouts Caesar salad, winter-veg gnocchi and a spectacular trifle from that gifted panettone!

programme.title: Nigella's Amsterdam Christmas
programme.desc: Nigella travels to Amsterdam to enjoy the festivities in the Venice of the North. Nigella visits her favourite places, picks up ingredients for her festive feast and makes traditional Dutch speculaas.

programme.title: Restoration Australia S7 - EP 6
programme.desc: Anthony Burke meets a pub rocker and a yoga teacher falling in love with Tasmania and a dunnyless, kitchenless, weatherboard relic falling apart in a small northern town. (Final)

programme.title: The Pacific: Summer Special (2025) - EP 21
programme.desc: In this Summer Special of The Pacific: we investigate the scale of illegal fishing across the region and the toll it's taking on Pacific nations. Plus we explore how growing militarisation in Palau is reshaping daily life.

programme.title: Alone Australia S3 - EP 1

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 1
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of days early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 2
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of days early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 1
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBCs Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 2
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBCs Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBCs The Exchange is the newsroom-based program for todays investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to todays markets and investors. CNBCs deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBCs "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for todays Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to todays markets and investors. CNBCs deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the days agenda. Airing CNBCs award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Power Lunch - EP 2
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the days agenda. Airing CNBCs award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 1
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBCs Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, whats driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 2
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBCs Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, whats driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 1
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrows trading day.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 2
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrows trading day.

programme.title: Fast Money - EP 1
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is Americas post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Fast Money - EP 2
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is Americas post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.desc: Squawk Box Asia is CNBCs flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and the opening of Asias business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers

programme.desc: The China Connection delivers in-depth analysis of Chinas economy, markets and its relationship with the global landscape. Emily Chan brings you expert insights, exclusive interviews, covering key sectors, trade developments and policy shifts.

Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. It explores the countrys business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTNs English language service. programme.title: The Observers
programme.desc: The Observers on France 24 is a weekly show produced with photos, videos and personal accounts from Observers around the world. Top international current affairs are covered by using eyewitness accounts from Observers- people who are at the heart of an event. They send their photos and videos, which are verified and contextualized by France 24 team of professional journalists in Paris. The Observers are volunteers, and are not paid for their contributions.

programme.title: This World is Filled with Wants 5min.
French in a Happy Mood
programme.desc: Lets learn simple and easy-to-remember phrases, looking at a modern Europe that cherishes its history and traditions while pursuing a lifestyle that fits its stature. Furthermore, we explore tips for "happiness" and various forms of "joy" through the unique European way of thinking and values behind their languages and lifestyles.

programme.title: Real-Life Travel English
programme.desc: This program is a practical listening course designed to help you understand fast-paced real English that you encounter when traveling abroad.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: Kid's Discovery (R)
programme.desc: In this program, children around the age of 4 can experience the pleasure of playing with friends, the wonder of life, the joy of doing thigs by themselves, and consideration for others, all while having fun through various discoveries.

programme.title: With Mother (R)
programme.desc: This children's program includes a puppet show, cartoon, music, and gymnastics in which children can participate.

programme.title: See, Learn, Explore--A Deep Travelogue in Tohoku
programme.desc: Explore the unknown charms of the Tohoku region of northern Japan.

programme.title: Drama Serial "The Ghost Writer's Wife" Ep. 61 (R)
programme.desc: The 113th Drama Serial, inspired by the lives of Koizumi Setsu and Lafcadio Hearn also known as Koizumi Yakumo, portrays those who were left behind in the rapidly Westernizing Meiji era. programme.title: The Ordinary Road - EP 3
programme.desc: It tells an inspirational story. Led by experienced seniors in the industry, a group of youngsters who have just started their careers are growing alongside each other and ultimately surpassing themselves through their strong belief, learning from one another.

programme.title: 7 Secretaries - EP 7
programme.desc: A covert group of nameless secretaries working for powerful dignitaries help the poor and punish the evil using their access to confidential information.

programme.title: Hot Door Night - EP 140
programme.desc: Catch all the fun and laughter right here as we bring you Taiwan's top-grossing variety entertainment show that will keep you wanting for more!

programme.title: Billionaire Story - EP 351
programme.desc: A street separates two worlds. On one side, there is a hard-working life in the market with both hardships and laughter; one the other, it's the life of rich and wealthy families who are intriguing and trembling.

programme.title: Sound Trek 2025 - EP 7
programme.desc: A stage for the bold, a dream for the fearless! Sound Trek gathers aspiring talents ready to shine. From folk to pop to bel canto, their voices ignite the stage. Who will deliver the stunning debut that captures it all?

programme.title: Hot Door Night - EP 140
programme.desc: Catch all the fun and laughter right here as we bring you Taiwan's top-grossing variety entertainment show that will keep you wanting for more!

programme.title: Final Destiny - EP 20
programme.desc: Jigong (Xiao Zhengnan) was originally a saint, however he falls into the mortal world for the investigation of some cases. Later, he loses all memories, becomes a mortal and leads a life with other villagers.

programme.title: 7 Secretaries - EP 7
programme.desc: A covert group of nameless secretaries working for powerful dignitaries help the poor and punish the evil using their access to confidential information.

programme.title: Ride the Wind 2023 - EP 17
programme.desc: Experience the strength of international female solidarity as talented performers from diverse industries unite to showcase the beauty of Chinese culture and surpass their own limits in the highly anticipated season of Sisters.

programme.title: Fraudstars - EP 1
programme.desc: Director Chi Leung (Pierre Ngo), producer Herman (Lawrence Cheng), screenwriter Sa Sa (Angel Chiang) and the film crew plan to make a hit movie. Their dream gets shattered as the investor dies. Faced with a massive bill, they have to act up a scam.

programme.title: Billionaire Story - EP 352
programme.desc: A street separates two worlds. On one side, there is a hard-working life in the market with both hardships and laughter; one the other, it's the life of rich and wealthy families who are intriguing and trembling.

programme.title: Oh! My Queen - EP 94
programme.desc: Embark on a regal journey with "Oh! My Queen" to craft a refreshingly down-to-earth entertainment experience! Delving into topics that resonate with everyone, each episode unfolds with lively discussions, injecting humor and joy into our daily lives, your go-to remedy for stress and a guaranteed laughter-inducing escape!

programme.title: The Blooming Journey 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: A heartfelt travelogue where five iconic actresses and two charismatic Gen Z brothers embark on a blooming journey of courage and connection. From mountains to markets, join them as they rediscover happiness, culture, and the joy of blooming together through life's adventures.

programme.title: Simple Days - EP 5
programme.desc: Gu Moli and Zhu Jincao struggled all the way from their hometown to set up a family of two in Shanghai. The marriage brought another problem that should not have been a problem - how they get along with their parents.

programme.title: Oh! My Queen - EP 94
programme.desc: Embark on a regal journey with "Oh! My Queen" to craft a refreshingly down-to-earth entertainment experience! Delving into topics that resonate with everyone, each episode unfolds with lively discussions, injecting humor and joy into our daily lives, your go-to remedy for stress and a guaranteed laughter-inducing escape!

programme.title: Made In Taiwan
programme.desc: "Made In Taiwan" records the rich and diverse history and humanities, local specialties, natural landscapes, as well as special ecology, plant research and other natural ecology, character close-ups, mountain scenery and etc., as the "Made In Taiwan" theme content. Expecting the viewing of the movie for nearly an hour is a rhythm and fresh, like a cloud and flowing water, which makes the viewers moved and harvests a rich intellectual journey.

programme.title: Kangsi Coming
programme.desc: Lead by Kevin Tsai and Dee Hsu, who never fail to entertain their audience by the fast-paced, humorous and fully self-aware hosting style. programme.title: Super Followers
programme.desc: Join Jacky Wu and Sandy Wu as they bridge generation gaps and co-host this programme that integrates intellectual interviews to present a unique and high-quality variety talk show!

programme.title: Hit the Headlines
programme.desc: Headline Talk Show is a political show co-hosted by anchor Zhou Yuqin and director of the political center Lin Jiayuan. Today's major current events can be seen in "Headline Talk Show"! Taiwan shouldn't just have only one voice, nor should Taiwan have only one color. "Headline Talk Show" is the most daring-speak-out TV show. We speak out your voice!

programme.title: OMG, Your Honour - EP 16
programme.desc: Two distinguished criminal barristers, Fan Siu Yu and Yiu Lik Hung, have been rivals since law school. Despite being classmates, their personalities and approaches to law are very different, leading to years of personal and professional conflict.

programme.title: Homeland Guardian & What's On Today - EP 5
programme.desc: Legendary Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho Fai, known for his role as one of the Three Tigers, faces a dramatic fall from grace after a failed mission. Joining the Special Duties Unit, he and his team fight to uncover and thwart a plot against Hong Kongs financial system.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2707
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: The Escape of the Seven: Resurrection - EP 7
programme.desc: Continuing the plot from the previous season of The Escape of the Seven, the sequel focuses on a man who dreams of becoming a king in a castle built on fake news and the counterattack of seven people escaping evil.

programme.title: No Room for Crime - EP 14
programme.desc: While Chi-hin meets up with Lam Ping, he notices some foreigner follows her. Chi-hin recognizes the stalker, who is the leader of a Mexican drug syndicate. And his nickname is Lion King. Lam Ping returns to the news agency to work. She is abruptly assaulted. Fortunately, Chi-hin and Wing-kei quickly come to her rescue. Lam Ping is remorseful about people dying due to some story. She is devastated. Because of some matter, Chi-hin wants to ask Kwok-yin for help through Tsan. But Kwok-yin declines.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2110
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: In Bed With A Stranger - EP 12
programme.desc: To help Ching-tin, Cheung-sing asks Chun-kau to help locate Christy. Sin-meis father Chu Yin-tat suffers from pain in the leg. Man-sum wants to take him to see some doctor. But Yin-tat does not listen to him. Man-sum insists, and Yin-tat eventually mentions he probably has bone cancer. Sin-mei guesses Man-sum is hiding something as she observes his behavior.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 782
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 26
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a Fire master in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHINGs third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 15
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

programme.title: I've Got The Power - EP 11
programme.desc: Chung Hau-nin (Ruco Chan), Kiu Yeuk-lam (Natalie Tong) and Ko Yung (Joel Chan) are complete strangers. After surviving a traffic accident, they astonishingly gain mystical power!_x000D__x000D_Hau-nin and Ding Shuk-man (Moon Lau) are a loving young married couple. Hau-nin intends to use his mystical power for his own benefit, but he knows how to use his mystical power to help other people as he is influenced by Yeuk-lam, who has a righteous character.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The - EP 12
programme.desc: General LI (TONG, MICHAEL) of the Chor Kingdom and wizard CHAI (CHAN HO, MOSES) were colleagues under the same mentor. LI killed CHAR when he found out that CHAR was having an affair with his wife SUKI (LEUNG TSAND, JADE). SUKI was ashamed of her affair, so she committed suicide. After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LIs spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 30
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.desc: Chung Hau-nin (Ruco Chan), Kiu Yeuk-lam (Natalie Tong) and Ko Yung (Joel Chan) are complete strangers. After surviving a traffic accident, they astonishingly gain mystical power!_x000D__x000D_Hau-nin and Ding Shuk-man (Moon Lau) are a loving young married couple. Hau-nin intends to use his mystical power for his own benefit, but he knows how to use his mystical power to help other people as he is influenced by Yeuk-lam, who has a righteous character.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The - EP 12
programme.desc: General LI (TONG, MICHAEL) of the Chor Kingdom and wizard CHAI (CHAN HO, MOSES) were colleagues under the same mentor. LI killed CHAR when he found out that CHAR was having an affair with his wife SUKI (LEUNG TSAND, JADE). SUKI was ashamed of her affair, so she committed suicide. After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LIs spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 30
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 31

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 27
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a Fire master in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHINGs third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 16
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.
